TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GifBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class GifBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定義用來編碼圖形交換格式 (GIF) 影像的編碼器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 映像不支援全域預覽、 全域縮圖、 全域中繼資料、 框架層級的縮圖或畫面格層級的中繼資料。 images do not support global preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, frame level thumbnails, or frame level metadata. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 映像並支援多個框架。 images do support multiple frames. 編碼不在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化至新的點陣圖影像編碼。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[gifbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GifBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/GifEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[gifbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GifBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/GifEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[gifbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GifBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/GifEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
